The History of Sir Eger, Sir Grahame, and Sir Gray-Steel Sir Eger, Sir Grime and Sir Graysteele.
Newly corrected and amended.
72 p.
Printed by Robert Sanders ... and are to be sold in his shop, Glasgow : M. DC. LXIX [1669]
In verse. Imperfect: tightly bound, p. 63-66 torn, with loss of text. Running title: The history of Sir Gray-Steel. Cf. Cambridge bib. of Eng. lit., 1969. I,160. Bound and photographed following Wing F769. Reproduction of original in British Library.
=======

In verse. Imperfect: tightly bound, p. 63-66 torn, with loss of text. Running title: The history of Sir Gray-Steel. Cf. Cambridge bib. of Eng. lit., 1969. I,160. Bound and photographed following Wing F769. Reproduction of original in British Library.
